ED_Title: High-level meeting to commemorate and promote the International Day against Nuclear Tests
ED_DecisionText: At its 104th plenary meeting, on 9 September 2019, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President, decided, without setting a precedent, to invite Mr. Lassina Zerbo, Executive Secretary of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization and Her Excellency Annika Thunborg, Ambassador of Sweden to Mexico and former Spokesperson and Chief of Public Information of the Preparatory Commission for the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty, to make statements at the high-level meeting to commemorate and promote the International Day against Nuclear Tests.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/73/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
